participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, always exploring new ideas and places.
participant_1.background: i am a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and energetic, loves family and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day.
